name: material-entity-citation
title: MaterialEntityCitation
description: A record of citation against a material entity.

fields.name: materialEntityID
fields.description: The identifier for the MaterialEntity to which this Citation refers.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: pageNumber
fields.description: The number of the page on which the Citation occurs in the Reference.

fields.name: citationRemarks
fields.description: Notes or comments about the Citation.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.description: The identifier for the literature Reference in which the Citation occurs.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: referenceType
fields.description: The type of the literature Reference.

fields.name: bibliographicCitation
fields.description: The bibliographic citation for the literature Reference.

fields.name: referenceYear
fields.description: The four-digit year in which the Reference was published or written occurred, according to the Common Era Calendar.

fields.name: wasPeerReviewed
fields.description: A statement on whether the Reference was peer reviewed.
